html:
Practical Statistics

Given the amount of data that is being generated in almost every field of life and human activity, statistics is becoming an essential skill to any scientist. This module aims to provide you with the understanding of the statistical methodology used to describe, summarise and analyse data.

You’ll be introduced to the application of the hypothesis testing procedure based on various statistical tests for qualitative and quantitative data, using both hand calculations and statistical software. As such, this module will equip you with hands-on practical statistics skills for the analysis of real-world data.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Identify appropriate numerical and graphical summaries of data;

+  Perform statistical tests and corresponding confidence intervals for a specified range of situations;

+  Validate the assumptions underlying these techniques;

+  Draw appropriate conclusions relating to real-life problems.

Module Content:
